summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Russian auto service center landing page. Backend API fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI working correctly on both desktop and mobile with proper responsiveness, animations, and form integration.

Hero section with CTA phone button (tel:+79219376137)
Services section with all 8 service cards displayed
About section with text and images
Contact form integration with backend API
Footer with contact information and phone link
Mobile responsiveness and menu toggle functionality
Phone links functionality (6 phone links found, all working)
Form success message display after submission

success_percentage.mobile: 100% (responsive design and mobile menu working correctly)
